professional.title: Video Game Developer
professional.description: Designed and developed 'Mutiny', a card game demo available on Steam using Godot and C#. Provided freelance gameplay programming services for small game development teams.

professional.title: 3D Software Engineering Intern
professional.description: Developed a 3D simulator in Three.js/GLSL for over 30 clients. Implemented more than 20 features including heightmaps, terrain painting, and asset library management, while handling deployment and production.

professional.title: Research Engineering Intern
professional.description: Designed and implemented an allocation algorithm for persistent memory (NVRAM) on highly parallel computing systems.

academic.description: Focused on video game physics, real-time rendering and global illumination, and advanced software engineering.

academic.degree: Engineering Degree in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics
academic.description: Specialized in Information Systems Engineering. Courses included 3D graphics and rendering pipelines, object-oriented software design, and advanced algorithms. Ranked 7th out of 250 students.
Intensive mathematics and physics program preparing for entrance to top engineering schools.
